magic-square_key2: `Magic Square` is that kind of square in which sum of each row, sum of each column and sum of both the diagonals is equal.
magic-square_key3: You have to write this program that takes a `nested list` as `input` and checks whether it is a `magic square` or not?
magic-square_key11: To visualize this sqaure, see it like a square. All the rows have same number of elements. Number of elements in row should be equal to number of elements in a column.
magic-square_key12: This is not a magic square :
magic-square_key14: Because the sum of elements of the second row is not 15 nahi hai, therefore this is not a magic square.
magic-square_key16: Pls see that the program that you wrote works for only 3x3 square or it works for any size of square.
magic-square_key17: Write this program for square of any size, square of any size so that if a user enters square of any size, your program should give the correct `output`.
magic-square_key19: For this `nested list`, what will be your answer - `True` or `False`.
magic-square_key21: If the given `nested list` is not a `square`, then return `False`, on the first go.
